Yesterday I regaled my high school students with tales of the abbreviations we used to use back in the wild days of MMORPGs.

Apparently the concept of "afk" is hilarious, because how is that even a thing anymore?

They also laughed at "brb bio" and then I had to explain raids. https://t.co/WVMQr5ywyL
